author: Levon Sevunts
title: Beijing's pandemic response is China's 'Chornobyl moment,' critics say
description: China is getting its own "Chornobyl moment" due to Beijing's attempts to hide and distort key scientific data on the COVID-19 pandemic and its crackdown on whistleblowers questioning the government's response to the outbreak, say the authors of an open letter…
